section.title:
payments
selection of Select Payment
section.para: To select a individual A/P open item for payment, choose the SELECT button. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Select A/P Open Item for Payment

section.para: When specifying payment details for a selected A/P open item, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Displays the name of the Vendor who is owed payment.
Displays the Document Number of the Document being selected for payment.
Valid Document Types include posted Vouchers and miscellaneous A/P Debit Memos.
Displays the Purchase Order Number (if any) of the Purchase Order associated with the Document.
In the case of a Voucher, the Document date is the same as the Invoice date.
Displays the date payment is due.
The due date is determined based on the billing Terms selected at the time the Document is posted.
Displays the billing Terms selected at the time the Document was posted.
Displays the total amount due to the Vendor.
The total owed is equal to the vouchered amount--or to the amount of the miscellaneous A/P Credit Memo at the time of posting.
Displays the balance due to the Vendor.
The balance owed will differ from the total owed if Discounts are applied based on the specified billing Terms.
Specify the amount to be paid to the Vendor. If a billing Terms Discount is applied, the payment amount will be reduced automatically by the Discount amount.

note.para: The payment amount is the amount which appears on A/P Checks when they are created.

listitem.para: Specify the Bank Account to be used for paying the A/P open item.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without specifying payment details, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates and saves the payment details.
Select to apply any billing Terms Discount you may be eligible for.
